comment: Beware of this professor! She isn't accessible outside of class. Her communication is terrible. She's rude whenever she manages to email back. I've had many professors, the worst of all, and I have taken over 30 credits.

In this class it was three big grades and rest was easy light assignments. Honestly she's really nice and it's an easy A if you do the work. I wouldn't say she grades hardly but she definitely isn't passing out A's but i'd take her again because the class was low stress and assignments were clear.

I wouldn't recommend it typically do very well in english. I i tried reaching out to her for a better grade but she just told me that in the syllabus it says she can ignore them. Do not take her unless you're ready to hear about her talk about her life. Overall she was boring and no help to me whatsoever.

Overall she is an okay professor. She has 3 major essays and very few quizzes. She's a bit of a hard grader. She often talks about her personal life during class so it's entertaining/boring at the same time. Don't bother reaching out to her in an email because she will not respond. She is very helpful in class and will give you good feedback.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: has a very nasty attitude i wouldn't recommend

Professor Hill is kind and provides great feedback on your writing. There are 3 major assignments which are all essays focused around a topic you pick at the beginning of the semester. Overall the class is low stress, and attendance is not required; however, some assignments will be done in class meaning you have to attend to get a grade.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Caring--Graded by few things
